channel.title: Active Directory on Robin Granberg - Managed Privileges
channel.description: Recent content in Active Directory on Robin Granberg - Managed Privileges

item.title: Finding Highly Privileged Accounts in ACL's - Part 2 - GROUP POLICY
item.description: In the previous post Part 1 I introduced a way to detect a malicious actor account in the access control list of the domain root.

item.title: Finding Highly Privileged Accounts in ACL's - Part 1
item.description: When trying to identify the highly privileged accounts in an Active Directory you might start with the members of the built-in administrative groups like Domain Admin etc.

item.title: Do You Allow Blank Passwords In Your Environment
item.description: This is a repost of my previous post at: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/archive/blogs/pfesweplat/do-you-allow-blank-passwords-in-your-domain. My blog posts at Microsoft was temporarly deleted so just in case I re-post this one here.
